item.title: Software Engineer (WAN Optimization) (santa clara)
item.description:
Position
Tap into your creativity and development skills to design and develop next-generation network and application performance monitoring appliances.

OPNET's ACE product line automatically applies expert knowledge about how applications, servers, and networks interact, providing a comprehensive analysis of the end-to-end performance of networked applications as well as live application performance monitoring of an entire network. Join an exceptionally talented team of software engineers with broad technical interests including optimization algorithms, data modeling, user interfaces, and network management as we continue to define the state of the art and develop next-generation software products.

Qualifications
Here is what you should bring to the table:

* BS/MS in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Math, or Physics degree or equivalent experience
* 3+ years of C/C++ coding experience
* Proficiency with C/C++ development in a UNIX environment
* A strong background in computer science and/or networking
* Experience with analysis of TCP and/or application and network interaction is strongly preferred
* Experience with implementation of packet sniffers and/or protocol analyzers is strongly preferred
* A solid understanding of WAN optimization techniques is strongly preferred
* Direct experience with WAN accelerators or relational databases is desirable
* Proficiency with Java development is desirable
* Must be motivated to have an impact on our products, our company, and the state of the art.

Location
Santa Clara, CA office

Please click the following link to formally apply for this position https://enterprise1.opnet.com/recruiting/positions/show_job/4470. Once in the link please click "Apply" and fill in the appropriate information.

Please visit www.opnet.com for more information on the company.

What OPNET Can Offer You!
Were a group of overachievers and we want more people like ourselves. If you join us, well reward you for your skills, your ideas, and your drive by providing you with an environment where challenge, teamwork, and an opportunity to make a real difference happen every day.

Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action H/V
